comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: Gotha was also in the race to build Taubes. During the Taube production they produced four different Taube designs, which got the identification LE [Land Eindecker - Land Monoplane] 1 - 4. This picture show the LE 3 on an exposition of war trophies in Paris (Cours des Invalides). There are a lot of pictures of this Taube, which had the German serial A.72/14. Gotha LE 3 Taube exposited in Paris Other pictures of this Taube and the mass of spectators around it can be seen at [gallica.bnf.fr/Search?ArianeWireIndex=index&p=1&l...]
